thread.title: Oscars 2017: 'Lion’ Star Sunny Pawar Had An Absolute Ball At His First Academy Awards
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: 'Lion’ Star Sunny Pawar Had An Absolute Ball At His First Academy Awards

author: Rachel McGrath
title: Oscars 2017: 'Lion’ Star Sunny Pawar Had An Absolute Ball At His First Academy Awards
text:
Sunny does not speak English, and learnt his ‘Lion’ lines phonetically. Then, inside the theatre, he took his seat just behind Scarlett Johansson and Denzel Washington: screams this pic was already so great and then i saw little sunny pawar back there oansksns pic.twitter.com/VyyypqfBmC — if you need me (@chnkais) February 27, 2017 
There are no words for this level of cuteness. Oscars 2017: All The Red Carpet Pics Oscars 2017: All The Red Carpet Pics 1 70 Viola Davis HOLLYWOOD, CA - FEBRUARY 26: Actor Viola Davis attends the 89th Annual Academy Awards at Hollywood & Highland Center on February 26, 2017 in Hollywood, California. (Photo by Kevin Mazur/Getty Images) Share this slide: Kevin Mazur via Getty Images More:
